text: Pamene mavuto amadza pa munthu, iye amapemphera kwa Ifemogonachanthiti, mokhalapansikapenamoimirira. Koma tikangomuchotsera mavuto ake, iye amatsatila njira zake kukhala ngati sadatipemphe kuti timuchotsere mavuto omwe adamupeza. Kotero zidakongoletsedwa kwa anthu oononga zimene anali kuchita
